description: A React component that displays a leaderboard by polling a backend for top scores periodically.

methods.name: Scoreboard({ highlightUsername, pollInterval = 5000, limit = 10, disabled })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a scoreboard with top scores, polling the backend at specified intervals.
